sentences.en: Adults about the real human skeletal muscle total weight of 40 %.
sentences.cn: 成人身上真正的横纹肌约占人体总重量的40%.

sentences.en: All grades of disorders occur, ranging from defective skeletal coverings to absence of the brain.
sentences.cn: 所有发生紊乱的程度, 从有缺陷的骨骼外壳到缺脑不等.

sentences.en: Both AdipoR 1 and AdipoR 2 are abundantly expressed in human skeletal muscle.
sentences.cn: 人脂联素受体AdipoR1和AdipoR2均在骨骼肌丰富表达.

sentences.en: But skeletal muscle is very different from heart muscle.
sentences.cn: 但骨骼肌与心肌有明显区别.

sentences.en: Framework models provide an excellent view of the skeletal shape of a molecule.
sentences.cn: 骨架模型提供了分子骨架形状的极好图象.

sentences.en: Glauconite, detrital carbonate skeletal debris, marine fossils, and collophane are commonly present.
sentences.cn: 海绿石 、 碳酸盐骨骸碎屑 、 海相化石和胶磷矿普遍出现.

sentences.en: Having a large skeletal structure and well - developed muscles; mesomorphic.
sentences.cn: 有宽阔的骨骼结构和发达的肌肉的; 适于运动的.

sentences.en: Jacket restraint is used if skeletal pin or wire is used.
sentences.cn: 如果骨胳穿上针或钢丝就要用背心约束.

sentences.en: Metastases of bone is the most common disease in the skeletal system.
sentences.cn: 骨转移癌是骨骼系统中最常见的肿瘤.

sentences.en: Others are merely accumulations of coral and skeletal debris.
sentences.cn: 而另一些则仅仅是珊瑚和骸骨碎片的堆积.

sentences.en: Passenger services can best be described as skeletal.
sentences.cn: 对乘客的服务已经少到不能再少。

sentences.en: Police discovered the skeletal remains of a corpse buried near the river.
sentences.cn: 警方发现了埋在河边的一具尸骨。
衣衫褴褛、骨瘦如柴的人

sentences.en: Skeletal vibrations are usually very sensitive to changes in the immediate environment of the vibrating group.
sentences.cn: 骨架振动常因振动基因的环境变化而十分敏感.

sentences.en: Transient immobilization and stravation add to this impost on the skeletal muscle mass.
sentences.cn: 暂时的卧床和饥饿更加重了这种骨胳肌的消耗.

sentences.en: Unlike skeletal muscles, facial muscles do not immediately start to atrophy.
sentences.cn: 面肌不象骨骼肌, 面肌不会马上开始萎缩.

words.tran_cn: 骨骼的；骨瘦如柴的；概略的
骨架，骨骼；纲要；骨瘦如柴的人
[生物]骨骼的，像骨骼的；骸骨的；骨瘦如柴的

trans.tran_cn: 骨骼的，骸骨的，骨瘦如柴的
trans.tran_en: like a skeleton or relating to a skeleton
